verses.1: Topa phat un. Vantung panin Topa phat unla, a sangna panin amah phat un.
verses.2: Ama vantungmi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. Ama mihonte khempeuh aw, amah phat un.
verses.3: Ni le kha aw, amah phat un. A taang aksi khempeuh aw, amah phat un.
verses.4: Van sang pen te le vantung a om tuite aw, amah phat un.
verses.5: Topaʼ min amaute phatsak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thu pia a, amaute a piang hi.
verses.6: Amaute a tawntung a om dingin amah in kipsak a, a palsat loh ding uh thupiakna amah in a bawl hi.
verses.7: Leitung panin Topa phat un, no gulpi liante le tuipi thuk khempeuh,
verses.8: mei le gial, tuikhal le vuk, ama thupiakna a mang huihpi!
verses.9: Amah phat un, no mual liante le mual neute khempeuh, gah a nei singkungte le taamtak singkung khempeuh!
verses.10: Gamsate le innsate khempeuh, a bokvak ganhingte le a leeng vasate khempeuh!
verses.11: No leitung kumpite le mihing khempeuh, leitung uliante le thukhente khempeuh!
verses.12: Nungakte le tangvalte, teeksiate le naupangte aw, amah phat un.
verses.13: Topaʼ min phat un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah bek a min lian hi a, ama minthanna pen leitung le vantung sangin sang zaw lai hi.
verses.14: Amah in ama mite thahatsak a, ama mi siangthote khempeuh, ama mai ah a om Israel-te khempeuh in amah phat uh hi. Topa phat un.
